name: UTourVoice
0:
”Alexa, ask the New Home Assistant to tell me about the builder”
”Alexa, ask the New Home Assistant how long has the builder been in business”
”Alexa, ask the New Home Assistant what is the price range of this home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new home assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des: The UTour Voice Skill allows home shoppers that schedule a self-guided home tour to ask Alexa questions during their visit to learn more about the home, the community, and the builder. They can even use Alexa to make a call to the community salesperson. For access, speak with your UTour Client Success Manager to register an account and to complete your registration of the UTour Voice Skill. This skill requires account linking.
